p: It was performed initially with 1 animal. The patch containing test substance weighing 0.5 g was applied over the test sides and held with non-adhesive dressings while untreated adjacent areas of skin was served as controlled. For initial test at 3 suitable sites the sample application was carried out and sample was removed at each of 3 time points; 3 min, 1 h and 4 h after application. At the end of exposure period the sample was removed by gentle swabbing with cotton wool soaked in distilled water. Skin reactions were observed timely at 1, 24, 48 and 72 h after removal of sample and responses were graded according to standard score system.
